titles.title: Freedom Debate Act of 1997

To require that candidates who receive campaign financing from the Presidential Election Campaign Fund agree not to participate in multicandidate forums that exclude candidates who have broad-based public support.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Oversight.

bill.summary: 09/16/1997--Introduced. Freedom Debate Act of 1997 - Requires candidates who receive campaign financing from the Presidential Election Campaign Fund to agree in writing not to participate in multicandidate forums that exclude candidates with broad-based public support.
